overview:
Avishai is a dreamer - also known as a Visionary Expert. Raised in Sydney, Australia, his visions have led him to pursue a diverse range of creative business endeavors.

He comes with over a decade of experience in building and marketing online companies. He has also lent his entrepreneurial skills to consult other small and large companies. At Computer Associates, a Fortune 500 Company, Avishai was instrumental in introducing their online products to the Australian market. At PureProfile, an online start-up, he single-handed built their â€˜research departmentâ€™, earning the company revenues in excess of $500K per month in just over six months.

Avishaiâ€™s relentless need for challenges and seeing his visions come to life, are the basic ingredients that brought Picaholic together. At Picaholic, he has particular responsibility for strategy, alliances and company growth.

When Avishai actually finds himself some spare time, you can usually find him drinking lattesâ€™ at either Bondi Beach or at Larchmont when in LA.
